summary: Processes and prepares image data for use with an ImageGPT model, handling tasks such as loading, resizing, normalizing, and converting images into the token format required by the model, as well as decoding model outputs back into visual representations.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of visual content into generative AI workflows, allowing applications such as image generation, captioning, or multimodal understanding to leverage a GPTâ€‘style architecture.
